column4: please, does anybody know how to fix this problem? > my screen resolution is set to 1280x1024, but i need it at 1920x1280. i know how to change the screen resolution but the option for 1920x1280 isn't there anymore, it used to be, but now there's just blank space... anyone know how to fix this?

please, does anybody know how to fix this problem? > my screen resolution is set to 1280x1024, but i need it at 1920x1280. i know how to change the screen resolution but the option for 1920x1280 isn't there anymore, it used to be, but now there's just blank space... anyone know how to fix this?
